lead_paragraph: The Sports of The Times column on Wednesday, about the 1965 Orange Bowl game, between Alabama and Texas, the same teams that played in the Bowl Championship Series title game on Thursday night, misstated the given name of a tackle who helped stop Alabama’s Joe Namath at the goal line on the game’s pivotal play. He is Diron Talbert, who played at Texas from 1964 to 1966 — not Don, his brother, who played there from 1959 to 1961. The error was repeated on Thursday in a Sports of The Times column about Namath’s memories of the game.
